parameters.description_en: Type of the data specified in input_file Default = `fasta'
parameters.description_cn: Type of the data specified in input_file Default = `fasta'

parameters.description_en: Title for BLAST database Default = input file name provided to -in argument
parameters.description_cn: Title for BLAST database Default = input file name provided to -in argument

parameters.description_en: Option to parse seqid for FASTA input if set, for all other input types seqids are parsed automatically
parameters.description_cn: Option to parse seqid for FASTA input if set, for all other input types seqids are parsed automatically

parameters.description_en: Create index of sequence hash values.
parameters.description_cn: Create index of sequence hash values.

parameters.description_en: Comma-separated list of input files containing masking data as produced by NCBI masking applications (e.g. dustmasker, segmasker, windowmasker)
parameters.description_cn: Comma-separated list of input files containing masking data as produced by NCBI masking applications (e.g. dustmasker, segmasker, windowmasker)

parameters.description_en: Comma-separated list of strings to uniquely identify the masking algorithm * Requires:  mask_data * Incompatible with:  gi_mask
parameters.description_cn: Comma-separated list of strings to uniquely identify the masking algorithm * Requires:  mask_data * Incompatible with:  gi_mask

parameters.description_en: Comma-separated list of free form strings to describe the masking algorithm details * Requires:  mask_id
parameters.description_cn: Comma-separated list of free form strings to describe the masking algorithm details * Requires:  mask_id

parameters.description_en: Create GI indexed masking data. * Requires:  parse_seqids * Incompatible with:  mask_id
parameters.description_cn: Create GI indexed masking data. * Requires:  parse_seqids * Incompatible with:  mask_id

parameters.description_en: Comma-separated list of masking data output files. * Requires:  mask_data, gi_mask
parameters.description_cn: Comma-separated list of masking data output files. * Requires:  mask_data, gi_mask

parameters.description_en: Name of BLAST database to be created Default = input file name provided to -in argumentRequired if multiple file(s)/database(s) are provided as input
parameters.description_cn: Name of BLAST database to be created Default = input file name provided to -in argumentRequired if multiple file(s)/database(s) are provided as input

parameters.description_en: Version of BLAST database to be created Default = `5'
parameters.description_cn: Version of BLAST database to be created Default = `5'

parameters.description_en: Maximum file size for BLAST database files Default = `1GB'
parameters.description_cn: Maximum file size for BLAST database files Default = `1GB'

parameters.description_en: File to which the program log should be redirected
parameters.description_cn: File to which the program log should be redirected

parameters.description_en: Taxonomy ID to assign to all sequences * Incompatible with:  taxid_map
parameters.description_cn: Taxonomy ID to assign to all sequences * Incompatible with:  taxid_map

parameters.description_en: Text file mapping sequence IDs to taxonomy IDs. Format:<SequenceId> <TaxonomyId><newline> * Requires:  parse_seqids * Incompatible with:  taxid
parameters.description_cn: Text file mapping sequence IDs to taxonomy IDs. Format:<SequenceId> <TaxonomyId><newline> * Requires:  parse_seqids * Incompatible with:  taxid
